description: Rich, decadent and delicious, that's how I describe this slice.
name: Chocolate Peppermint Slice Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 tsp Peppermint Essence  depending on your taste buds

recipeInstructions.text: This decadent slice is best stored in the fridge. Just remove for a few minutes prior to serving and enjoy!
